rundown: 7-6 W @ St. Louis Cardinals Joey Wentz: 3.0 innings, 0 earned runs, 0 hits, 0 HR, 6 strikeouts Batters: Sean Murphy (1 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) Marcell Ozuna (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Ronald Acuña Jr. (1 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a narrow victory against the Cardinals, showcasing a strong offensive performance. Key highlights include Sean Murphy's impactful home run that drove in three runs, Marcell Ozuna's two-hit game including a home run, and Ronald Acuña Jr.'s contribution with a home run and two runs scored. Joey Wentz set the tone early with an impressive strikeout performance, allowing no hits in his three innings pitched.
